amendment.description: To authorize a pilot program on expanded public-private partnerships for research and development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1318 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1318 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8543-8544; text: CR S8543) To authorize a pilot program on expanded public-private partnerships for research and development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1318 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1318 proposed by Senator Warner.
